author: stas
msg: further optimization: push the reset requst output filter only if the
server was configured to support keepalive connections

author: stas
msg: support keepalive connections. I needed to add an output connection filter
which flags the input filter when the response is over, so that the input
filter will know to reset its state and be ready to parse headers of the
new request coming over the same connection.

author: stas
msg: use a proper keepalive test against the constant
